text: This is a list of cities in Eritrea by population. It includes all settlements with a population of over 5,000. Cities in Eritrea Rank City Population Region 1984 Census 2005 estimate 1 Asmara 475,385 943,707 Maekel 2 Keren 126,149 386,483 Anseba 3 Agordat 15,948 60,482 Gash-Barka 4 Dekemhare 17,290 70,180 Debub 5 Mendefera 22,184 88,492 Debub 6 Nakfa N/A 26.662 Northern Red Sea 7 Adi Keyh 8,691 26,310 Debub 8 Massawa 15,441 24,419 Northern Red Sea 9 Edd N/A 22,855 Southern Red Sea 10 Ghinda 7,702 21,523 Northern Red Sea 11 Barentu 2,500 20,968 Gash-Barka 12 Assab 31,037 20,222 Southern Red Sea 13 Teseney 52,531 88,889 Gash-Barka 14 Beilul N/A 24,055 Southern Red Sea 15 Mersa Fatuma N/A 11,542 Northern Red Sea 16 Himbirti N/A 8,822 Maekel 17 Nefasit N/A 8,727 Northern Red Sea 18 Adi Quala 14,465 37,589 Debub 19 Senafe 14,019 36,831 Debub 20 Segeneiti 13,328 35,656 Debub ==Other settlements== *Afabet *Algena *Anaghit *Baden *Bisha *Debaysima *Felhit *Filfil *Matara *Mersa Gulbub *Mersa Tek'lay | *Nakfa *Om Hajer *Per Tokar *Quatit *Rehayto *Saatta *Sebderat *T'i'o *Tognuf *Zula ---|--- Eritrea, List of cities in * Eritrea
title: List of cities in Eritrea
